com.example.android.arrival.Util

Interface AccountCallbackListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DriverMapActivity, DriverProfileScreenActivity, LoginActivity, MainActivity, MyFirebaseMessagingService, RegistrationActivity, RiderMapActivity, RiderProfileScreenActivity, SplashActivity

    public interface AccountCallbackListener
    Interface to be implemented by Activities that want to access account information from Firebase through the AccountManager. Methods determine how to receive the data pulled from the database.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAccountCreated(java.lang.String accountType)
      called when a user account has been created
      void onAccountCreationFailure(java.lang.String e)
      called when a user account fails to be created
      void onAccountDeleted()
      called when user account is successfully deleted in firebase
      void onAccountDeleteFailure(java.lang.String e)
      called when user account fails to be deleted in firebase
      void onAccountTypeRetrieved(java.lang.String userType)
      called when a user has been successfully signed in
      void onAccountTypeRetrieveFailure(java.lang.String e)
      called when a user has been unsuccessfully signed in
      void onAccountUpdated()
      called when account details are updated in firebase
      void onAccountUpdateFailure(java.lang.String e)
      called when account details fail to update in firebase
      void onDataRetrieveFail(java.lang.String e)
      called when retrieval of user object is unsuccessful
      void onDriverDataRetrieved(Driver driver)
      called when data for driver is retrieved
      void onImageUpload()
      called when image is successfully uploaded to firebase storage
      void onImageUploadFailure(java.lang.String e)
      called when image fails to upload to firebase storage
      void onPhotoReceived(android.net.Uri uri)
      called when image is successfully received from firebase storage
      void onPhotoReceiveFailure(java.lang.String e)
      called when image is unable to be fetched from firebase storage
      void onRiderDataRetrieved(Rider rider)
      called when data for rider is retrieved
